data.message: Hey Em, I guarantee if you made a joint like " The Real Slim Shady" (Part 2) and dealt with all this Caitlyn Jenner bullshit, it would all go away. Please, make a stand.

replies.message: if  you have been following marshall for the last few years  and you are a real fan , you'd know that marshall is done with all that , he's done with contreversy and all that media bullshit , he's 42 years old , he squashed all of his beefs and he's just looking for inner peace , just to feel good about himself , haven't you been listening to his latest songs , like guts over fear when he says ( and it just breaks my heart to look at all the pain i caused , but what i'ma ..... )  and his latest collaboration with yelawolf on the best friend track when he said ( but i squash my beefs and things seem to be going descent recently but don't jinx it , its like clint eastwood looking for peace though maybe not thinner inner ........ )   he's gone private , he doesn't wanna talk to media or cause contreversy like he used to ,  he doesn't even like going out of his house these days except for going to the studio or an important event in his daughter's life .  yes he pokes fun at artists from times to times like he did with iggy izalea , but he's just having some fun , he doesn't want to go back to lawsuits and all that.
